import React, { Component } from "react"; import { FormattedMessage } from "react-intl"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from "reactstrap"; class ModalHotpot extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { email: "", }; } componentDidMount() {} toggle = () => { this.props.toggleFromParent(); }; render() { console.log("ckeck child props", this.props); console.log("ckeck child open modal", this.props.isOpen); return ( { this.toggle(); }} className={"modal-hotpot-container"} size="lg" centered > { this.toggle(); }} > Create new hotpot
